group_1.textRight: Look at what I brought! Take Two of Chinese-ified @New Year’s Food!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Tsuruno, you’re here! But take two…?

group_1.textRight: Yep! The presentation is different from Take One!
The first layer…[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:motion_200][chara:100301:lipSynch_1] has pork liver stir-fried with @garlic chives!

group_1.textLeft: Then, what’s in the second layer?

group_1.textRight: Nope! It’s garlic chives stir-fried with pork liver!
And finally the third layer…
Yep! Garlic chives stir-fried with garlic chives!

group_1.textLeft: Um… What’s the difference between the first and second layers?

group_1.textRight: The proportions of liver to chives are different!
And because I ran out of liver part-way through, @the last one only has chives!

group_1.textLeft: Woah, I’ve never seen osechi like this before!
so could you please close up the lid for now?

group_1.textRight: Master, don’t tell me you don’t like stir-fried liver @and chives?

group_1.textLeft: That’s not it. It just has a very strong smell.

group_1.textRight: Drat, I didn’t think about that at all…

group_1.textLeft: What did you dream of yesterday?

group_1.textRight: Yesterday?
Hmm… I don’t remember. I sleep soundly every @night.
Oof… It is sort of disappointing…

group_1.textLeft: You can consider the first dream you have, at any @time of the year, to be the “first dream” of the year.

group_1.textRight: Oh?! Great thinking, Master! Then I can make it @in time even if I dream now!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Ain’t no way you could dream right @this second.

group_1.textRight: Hehe, you know too little of the ways of the world, Felicia.
Witness the Tsuruno Falling into Dreamland @Technique!
Yep! Step one is falling asleep, and step two is dreaming!
First, you have to lie flat and relax your entire body!
Then, you focus all your concentration on your @forehead and release alpha waves!

group_1.textLeft: W-What? How do you do that?!

group_1.textRight: Just do that and you’ll… fall... asleep…
*Ka-shoo…*
[chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah?!
…Um, Iroha-san.
What happened in your new year’s dream?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, that’s right. We got off track and never heard @from you.

group_1.textRight: Oh, uh. In my new year's dream…
